snippet: The junior Northwestern junior Venric Mark leads a multi-dimensional Northwestern running attack, rushing for 107.6 yards per game with five touchdowns. Mark broke the 100-yard mark in three of the Wildcats' five games. He is five foot eight, and...
abstract: The junior Northwestern junior Venric Mark leads a multi-dimensional Northwestern running attack, rushing for 107.6 yards per game with five touchdowns. Mark broke the 100-yard mark in three of the Wildcats' five games. He is five foot eight, and finds satisfaction in proving doubters wrong.

headline.main: For Northwestern Running Back Mark, No Shortage of Motivation
